title: Almost 1200 wins! I heard on your 1000th win you can play with a riot employee .
body:
I missed my 1000th because i didn't know but , would it be possible for a riot member to play with me for my 1200? , it would be awesome , thank you for reading .
{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey ThreshLife,

Congratulations on your (almost) 1,200th win! If you're looking to play with a Rioter, the Help & Support sub-boards probably aren't the best place to look. But fear not; all hope is not lost. You're most likely to find a Rioter response on the [**General Discussion**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion) sub-boards or the [**Miscellaneous**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) sub-boards! Alternatively, there's a chatroom inside the League of Legends client that Rioters sometimes join, named "PlayWithRiot". 

Good luck on your search, and again, congratulations!
